blanked_sentence: HLA-B *35:08 is not associated with likelihood of ______ when treated with lamotrigine in people with Epilepsy.
option_c: Side Effect:Maculopapular Exanthema, Side Effect:Stevens-Johnson Syndrome
option_d: Side Effect:Maculopapular Exanthema, Side Effect:Severe Cutaneous Adverse Reactions, Side Effect:Stevens-Johnson Syndrome
